segments.text: I've heard that you provide very good service , so when I need a mover , I call you guys first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks a lot for calling us . Could you tell me more about what you need us to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you see , we are on the 8th floor , and moving into the 6th floor in another building . It is about 15 kilometers to get there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , the cost depends on the floor to move to , the distance between two places and the amount of the furniture to move .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much will it cost in that case ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , let me see . It fits the second standard rates . Have a look at the contract , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your charge is divided into two parts , the Payment in Advance and the rest . I thought that I should pay all of it before moving .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , firstly we sign the contract ; you pay 50 % of what it costs , and the rest when we finish moving .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The damage and compensation item confuses me . Could you give some explanation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . If any of the articles was damaged during moving , you may make a claim for compensation with our department .
segments.speaker: S2
